attributes.action: Stop the UK Police using owners of modified cars as an easy target!
attributes.additional_details:
As owners of modified cars, we're sick of being accused of being criminals.

Police need to learn the law, what's right and what's wrong..

Surely the Police need to get their priorities right before pointing the finger at innocent people who just want to go out to socialise with peers when there are criminals out their causing far more grief than a few people sitting in car parks.
